introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Cevaplıyoruz, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our cevapliyoruz.com website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

items.provide: To provide and maintain our services
items.improve: To improve and personalize our services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about updates, offers, and notifications
items.security: To ensure security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following cases:

items.providers: With our service providers (payment processors, cloud services, etc.) to deliver our services
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations or respond to legal process

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. These measures include encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments. However, please note that no data transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right to request access to your personal data
items.correct: Right to request correction of inaccurate data
items.delete: Right to request deletion of your data

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. When you delete your account, your data will be deleted within 30 days, except for legal retention requirements.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from anyone under 18. If we learn that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete it immediately.

hero.title: Shaping the Future of Customer Communication
hero.subtitle: Cevaplıyoruz is an AI-powered platform that enables businesses to communicate with their customers smarter, faster, and more effectively.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To transform customer communication for businesses of all sizes and maximize customer satisfaction with the power of AI technology. By simplifying complex processes, we help businesses deliver the best experience to their customers.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Cevaplıyoruz was founded in 2024 to fill the gaps in customer communication. We personally experienced how difficult it is to manage messages from different channels, respond to customer inquiries in a timely manner, and organize follow-up processes.
story.paragraph2: We set out to solve these challenges and developed an innovative platform that combines AI technology with customer communication. We created a solution that can manage Instagram, WhatsApp, email, and phone calls from one place, powered by artificial intelligence.
story.paragraph3: Today, we help hundreds of businesses transform their customer communication. Our goal is to turn every customer interaction into a valuable experience and contribute to business growth.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously research new technologies and provide our customers with the most advanced solutions.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.content: We prioritize our customers' needs in every decision we make.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.content: We believe success comes from working together and act with a strong team spirit.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: We communicate openly and honestly with our customers and partners.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.content: We know that time is valuable and continuously optimize our processes.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.subtitle: Learn how to request deletion of your data from Cevaplıyoruz.

intro.title: We Respect Your Privacy
intro.content: At Cevaplıyoruz, we place great importance on protecting your personal data. Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the right to request the deletion of your data. This page explains step by step how you can delete your data.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: When using our platform, we may collect the following data:

howToDelete.title: How to Delete Your Data
howToDelete.content: You can request deletion of your data through two methods:

method1.title: Method 1: From Account Settings
method1.step1: Log in to your Cevaplıyoruz account

method2.title: Method 2: Request via Email
method2.content: You can send your data deletion request to the email address below. Please use the email address associated with your account.

afterDeletion.title: After Deletion
afterDeletion.content: When your data deletion request is approved:

items.permanent: All your personal data will be permanently deleted
items.timeframe: Deletion will be completed within 30 days
items.confirmation: You will be notified by email when the process is complete
items.exceptions: Some data may be retained due to legal requirements

facebook.title: For Facebook/Instagram Connection
facebook.content: If you connected to Cevaplıyoruz through your Facebook or Instagram account, you can also delete your data as follows:
facebook.step1: Go to Facebook Settings & Privacy > Settings
facebook.step4: Click "Remove" and check "Delete all information I shared"
facebook.note: This will automatically delete your Facebook/Instagram data from our Cevaplıyoruz systems as well.

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.content: Contact us if you have questions about data deletion.
